title: Metro 2033
notes: Audio is extremely glitchy; graphics and controls seem fine in DX9 mode.

title: Metro 2033
notes: At the beginnig a green screen shows up, just press alt+f4 and you're good to go

title: Metro 2033
notes: No issues- Tested on High Settings

title: Metro 2033
notes: By default launches to DX9 and plays fine. Performance isn't great but I think that's mostly my old CPU holding it back. The PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command% launch option gives lets you select DX10 and DX11 in the video options, but the game crashes upon restarting to apply the change. The game asks to launch in safe mode to let you back in under DX9 (but video option will still be on DX11, so change it back for stability).
